features: Height Adjustable Brackets: The TV wall mount features 3 levels of height adjustment after installation, ensuring your TV will be positioned at the right height for a more comfortable viewing experience.

Wide Compatibility: This full motion TV mount fits most 26”-60” TVs up to 77 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 100x100 to 400x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase.

Full Motion Flexibility: Featuring +5°/-15° tilt and +/-90° swivel, the flexible TV bracket helps to minimize glare and enjoy better viewing from anywhere in the room. Extend the arm out 19.51” for viewing or retract it back to 3.53” to save space.

Strong & Durable Construction: We are confident in the strength and durability of this TV wall mount made of premium steel material. The TV mount features security lock screws to secure the TV to the wall plate to avoid sliding or falling.

US-Based Customer Support: Step-by-step instruction manual and mounting hardware are included for easy installation, while the +/-3° post-installation leveling allows for perfect TV placement. Please contact our friendly product support team if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26”-60” TVs The PIMF9 full motion TV mount offers full motion flexibility for optimal viewing. The TV mount can be extended, swiveled 90 degrees, and tilted, making it possible for you to enjoy the best angle no matter where you are sitting.

The TV wall mount features an ultra-strong arm and security lock screws to provide stable support for your television. Designed with 3 height options, it’s easy to raise or lower your TV closer to eye level for more viewing comfort.

The high-quality TV bracket fits most 26”-60” TVs up to 77 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 100x100 to 400x400mm. Make sure to verify the wall type where you plan to mount the TV is wood stud framing, concrete, or brick to ensure compatibility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice TV mount
reviews.reviewText: This is a great TV mount and a super good value. Was easy to install and works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Perfect for my post mount for my patio.Easy to install and very solid. Easy to adjust for the perfect level. I would recommend for overall tv installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have my 2nd one installed, works great, holds everything firm
reviews.reviewText: I have two of these now, the first one was so good I got another. This one is holding a 50" TV this time and it holds it like a champ, no problem. Ease of install is fantastic. No complicated weird mechanics. Screw into studs in wall. Level. Bolt mounts onto TV. Hang TV. Lock in place. Simple. Range of motion is great and smooth action.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good mount works very well
reviews.reviewText: TV mount was very easy to install and operate. One thing I will say is although the package came with 2 different length bolts to attach the mounting plate to the back of the TV, just be aware that some TV mounting holes may not be deep enough to support the short bolt by itself and the long bolt may require that you use 2 spacers on each bolt. But overall, the mount is a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great low price for a product that works! We bought 2 and they both came working and complete. We mounted lighter smart TVs reasonably easily. Each bracket can be attached to the wall with 2 screws (option to add more). Lots of spacers and screws to fit different TVs. We are happy. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Choose this mount with confidence
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good product and a terrific value for the money. I am hanging a 45# LG OLED from it in a corner wall application. It works smoothly and makes access to the back of the set so easy. The TV glides beautifully and safely. I couldn't be happier with my selection! Ft Lauderdale 12/8/23

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this about a year ago. Since then it has changed location three times.It is used with a 50-in Westinghouse Roku TV. It comes with everything you need to install it. With all the adjustments you can makeIt is not hard to set up. However definitely make sure it is anchored properly before applying your television.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
